parameters.query: INSERT INTO sync_state (tenant_id, entity, last_cursor, last_sync_at, records_synced, status) VALUES ('{{ $json.project_id }}', 'campaigns', '{{ $json.new_cursor }}', NOW(), {{ $json.count }}, 'completed') ON CONFLICT (tenant_id, entity) DO UPDATE SET last_cursor = EXCLUDED.last_cursor, last_sync_at = NOW(), records_synced = EXCLUDED.records_synced, status = 'completed'
UPDATE sync_state SET status = 'error', last_sync_at = NOW() WHERE tenant_id = '{{ $json.project_id }}' AND entity = 'campaigns'
